summary:
This is a dungeon music file which originally made by me in 2004 for the RPG Neverwinter Nights. I have found it somewhere on my harddisk and thought it will mabye fit into this game too. :-) I have tried to test it in some dungeons and I think it will give some variety.
I hope that you like it. Comments are welcome. Thank you.

brgds
Balaghan
descriptionHtml:
This is a dungeon music file which originally made by me in 2004 for the RPG Neverwinter Nights. I have found it somewhere on my harddisk and thought it will mabye fit into this game too. :-) I have tried to test it in some dungeons and I think it will give some variety.
I hope that you like it. Comments are welcome. Thank you.

brgds
Balaghan

decompress the file in your music folder
xxx\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\music\\dungeon
author: Balaghan
